description:
The lightest base-layer in the Bergtagen series, this soft, high-performance t-shirt is perfect for your spring and summer outings. Engineered from a light jersey knit that combines the great thermal and moisture-wicking properties of fine Merino wool with the strength and durability of polyamide. It will warm you when it’s cold and be pleasantly cool on really hot days. And its active fit means it not only gives great freedom of movement – it looks good too.

Low on weight and high on comfort, it’s great for all kinds of spring and summer mountain activities. Wool’s natural resistance to bad odours means that it’s particularly useful on multi-day hikes.

The Merino wool used in Bergtagen base-layers is mulesing-free and traceable back to its farm of origin.
name: Fjallraven Bergtagen Thinwool SS T-Shirt - Mens
